Just had this issue happen again. Here's hopefully some additional information to help you confirm:

Says there's two consecutive messages in the Inbox: MessageA and MessageB. With the Message Pane close, but MessageA open (in a separate window), if MessageA is dragged and dropped from the Inbox to a folder in the Folder View, MessageB is immediately opened and marked as read. What I didn't notice before is two things: 1) that MessageA must be opened (if it is not, the problem does not occur), and 2) that MessageB is not just marked as read, but is also opened (this is because it opens in a window that is obscured behind the main window.)

I find this to be undesirable behavior because, as a user, I never explicitly opened MessageB and it is getting marked as read.
